dct_title_s: Maps of Peiping and its environs in full colors
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Title from sleeve. Includes two maps, The map of Peiping (47 x 38 cm.), and Famous resorts of Peiping and environs (35 x 45 cm.), in pictorial color sleeve. Place names in English and Chinese characters.
dct_publisher_sm: Peiping [i.e.Beijing] : Published by Science Press ... ; distributed by Lynns Book Store ... , [ca. late 1930s].
